Spring Framework
  1. org.springframework.core.retry

Uses of Package
org.springframework.core.retry

Packages that use org.springframework.core.retry
Package
Description
org.springframework.core.retry
Main package for the core retry functionality.
org.springframework.core.retry.support
Support package for the core retry functionality.
  • Classes in org.springframework.core.retry used by org.springframework.core.retry
    Class
    Description
    Retryable
    Retryable is a functional interface that can be used to implement any generic block of code that can potentially be retried.
    RetryException
    Exception thrown when a RetryPolicy has been exhausted or interrupted.
    RetryListener
    RetryListener defines a listener API for reacting to events published during the execution of a Retryable operation.
    RetryOperations
    Interface specifying basic retry operations.
    RetryPolicy
    Strategy interface to define a retry policy.
    RetryPolicy.Builder
    Fluent API for configuring a RetryPolicy with common configuration options.
  • Classes in org.springframework.core.retry used by org.springframework.core.retry.support
    Class
    Description
    Retryable
    Retryable is a functional interface that can be used to implement any generic block of code that can potentially be retried.
    RetryException
    Exception thrown when a RetryPolicy has been exhausted or interrupted.
    RetryListener
    RetryListener defines a listener API for reacting to events published during the execution of a Retryable operation.
    RetryPolicy
    Strategy interface to define a retry policy.
